verses.verse: The word <WH1697> of the YY <WH3068> came again unto me, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,

Son <WH1121> of man <WH120>, say <WH559> <WH8798> unto the prince <WH5057> of Tyrus <WH6865>, Thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>; Because thine heart <WH3820> is lifted up <WH1361> <WH8804>, and thou hast said <WH559> <WH8799>, I am a 'Elohim <WH410>, I sit <WH3427> <WH8804> in the seat <WH4186> of 'Elohim <WH430>, in the midst <WH3820> of the seas <WH3220>; yet thou art a man <WH120>, and not 'Elohim <WH410>, though thou set <WH5414> <WH8799> thine heart <WH3820> as the heart <WH3820> of 'Elohim <WH430>:
Behold, thou art wiser <WH2450> than Daniel <WH1840>; there is no secret <WH5640> <WH8803> that they can hide <WH6004> <WH8804> from thee:

With thy wisdom <WH2451> and with thine understanding <WH8394> thou hast gotten <WH6213> <WH8804> thee riches <WH2428>, and hast gotten <WH6213> <WH8799> gold <WH2091> and silver <WH3701> into thy treasures <WH214>:

By thy great <WH7230> wisdom <WH2451> and by thy traffick <WH7404> hast thou increased <WH7235> <WH8689> thy riches <WH2428>, and thine heart <WH3824> is lifted up <WH1361> <WH8799> because of thy riches <WH2428>:
Therefore thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>; Because thou hast set <WH5414> <WH8800> thine heart <WH3820> as the heart <WH3824> of 'Elohim <WH430>;

Behold, therefore I will bring <WH935> <WH8688> strangers <WH2114> <WH8801> upon thee, the terrible <WH6184> of the nations <WH1471>: and they shall draw <WH7324> <WH8689> their swords <WH2719> against the beauty <WH3308> of thy wisdom <WH2451>, and they shall defile <WH2490> <WH8765> thy brightness <WH3314>.
They shall bring thee down <WH3381> <WH8686> to the pit <WH7845>, and thou shalt die <WH4191> <WH8804> the deaths <WH4463> of them that are slain <WH2491> in the midst <WH3820> of the seas <WH3220>.

Wilt thou yet <WH559> <WH8800> say <WH559> <WH8799> before <WH6440> him that slayeth <WH2026> <WH8802> thee, I am 'Elohim <WH430>? but thou shalt be a man <WH120>, and no 'Elohim <WH410>, in the hand <WH3027> of him that slayeth <WH2490> <WH8764> thee.

Thou shalt die <WH4191> <WH8799> the deaths <WH4194> of the uncircumcised <WH6189> by the hand <WH3027> of strangers <WH2114> <WH8801>: for I have spoken <WH1696> <WH8765> it, saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>.
Moreover the word <WH1697> of the YY <WH3068> came unto me, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,

Son <WH1121> of man <WH120>, take up <WH5375> <WH8798> a lamentation <WH7015> upon the king <WH4428> of Tyrus <WH6865>, and say <WH559> <WH8804> unto him, Thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>; Thou sealest up <WH2856> <WH8802> the sum <WH8508>, full <WH4392> of wisdom <WH2451>, and perfect <WH3632> in beauty <WH3308>.

Thou hast been in Eden <WH5731> the garden <WH1588> of 'Elohim <WH430>; every precious <WH3368> stone <WH68> was thy covering <WH4540>, the sardius <WH124>, topaz <WH6357>, and the diamond <WH3095>, the beryl <WH8658>, the onyx <WH7718>, and the jasper <WH3471>, the sapphire <WH5601>, the emerald <WH5306>, and the carbuncle <WH1304>, and gold <WH2091>: the workmanship <WH4399> of thy tabrets <WH8596> and of thy pipes <WH5345> was prepared <WH3559> <WH8797> in thee in the day <WH3117> that thou wast created <WH1254> <WH8736>.

Thou art the anointed <WH4473> cherub <WH3742> that covereth <WH5526> <WH8802>; and I have set <WH5414> <WH8804> thee so: thou wast upon the holy <WH6944> mountain <WH2022> of 'Elohim <WH430>; thou hast walked up and down <WH1980> <WH8694> in the midst <WH8432> of the stones <WH68> of fire <WH784>.
Thou wast perfect <WH8549> in thy ways <WH1870> from the day <WH3117> that thou wast created <WH1254> <WH8736>, till iniquity <WH5766> was found <WH4672> <WH8738> in thee.

By the multitude <WH7230> of thy merchandise <WH7404> they have filled <WH4390> <WH8804> the midst <WH8432> of thee with violence <WH2555>, and thou hast sinned <WH2398> <WH8799>: therefore I will cast thee as profane <WH2490> <WH8762> out of the mountain <WH2022> of 'Elohim <WH430>: and I will destroy <WH6> <WH8762> thee, O covering <WH5526> <WH8802> cherub <WH3742>, from the midst <WH8432> of the stones <WH68> of fire <WH784>.

Thine heart <WH3820> was lifted up <WH1361> <WH8804> because of thy beauty <WH3308>, thou hast corrupted <WH7843> <WH8765> thy wisdom <WH2451> by reason of <WH5921> thy brightness <WH3314>: I will cast <WH7993> <WH8689> thee to the ground <WH776>, I will lay <WH5414> <WH8804> thee before <WH6440> kings <WH4428>, that they may behold <WH7200> <WH8800> thee.

Thou hast defiled <WH2490> <WH8765> thy sanctuaries <WH4720> by the multitude <WH7230> of thine iniquities <WH5771>, by the iniquity <WH5766> of thy traffick <WH7404>; therefore will I bring forth <WH3318> <WH8686> a fire <WH784> from the midst <WH8432> of thee, it shall devour <WH398> <WH8804> thee, and I will bring <WH5414> <WH8799> thee to ashes <WH665> upon the earth <WH776> in the sight <WH5869> of all them that behold <WH7200> <WH8802> thee.

All they that know <WH3045> <WH8802> thee among the people <WH5971> shall be astonished <WH8074> <WH8804> at thee: thou shalt be a terror <WH1091>, and never <WH369> shalt thou be any more <WH5704> <WH5769>.
Again the word <WH1697> of the YY <WH3068> came unto me, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,
Son <WH1121> of man <WH120>, set <WH7760> <WH8798> thy face <WH6440> against Zidon <WH6721>, and prophesy <WH5012> <WH8734> against it,

And say <WH559> <WH8804>, Thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>; Behold, I am against thee, O Zidon <WH6721>; and I will be glorified <WH3513> <WH8738> in the midst <WH8432> of thee: and they shall know <WH3045> <WH8804> that I am the YY <WH3068>, when I shall have executed <WH6213> <WH8800> judgments <WH8201> in her, and shall be sanctified <WH6942> <WH8738> in her.

For I will send <WH7971> <WH8765> into her pestilence <WH1698>, and blood <WH1818> into her streets <WH2351>; and the wounded <WH2491> shall be judged <WH5307> <WH8768> in the midst <WH8432> of her by the sword <WH2719> upon her on every side <WH5439>; and they shall know <WH3045> <WH8804> that I am the YY <WH3068>.

And there shall be no more a pricking <WH3992> <WH8688> brier <WH5544> unto the house <WH1004> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, nor any grieving <WH3510> <WH8688> tshofar <WH6975> of all that are round about <WH5439> them, that despised <WH7590> <WH8801> them; and they shall know <WH3045> <WH8804> that I am the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>.

Thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>; When I shall have gathered <WH6908> <WH8763> the house <WH1004> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> from the people <WH5971> among whom they are scattered <WH6327> <WH8738>, and shall be sanctified <WH6942> <WH8738> in them in the sight <WH5869> of the heathen <WH1471>, then shall they dwell <WH3427> <WH8804> in their land <WH127> that I have given <WH5414> <WH8804> to my servant <WH5650> Ya`akov <WH3290>.

And they shall dwell <WH3427> <WH8804> safely <WH983> therein, and shall build <WH1129> <WH8804> houses <WH1004>, and plant <WH5193> <WH8804> vineyards <WH3754>; yea, they shall dwell <WH3427> <WH8804> with confidence <WH983>, when I have executed <WH6213> <WH8800> judgments <WH8201> upon all those that despise <WH7590> <WH8801> them round about <WH5439> them; and they shall know <WH3045> <WH8804> that I am the YY <WH3068> their 'Elohim <WH430>.
